articles.description: Dry fruits, also known as dried fruits, are nutrient-dense and can be a healthy addition to your winter diet. Here are six healthy dry fruits that you might consider incorporating into your winter meals:
articles.content: Dried figs are a good source of dietary fiber, vitamins, and minerals. They contain calcium, potassium, magnesium, and iron. Figs can be added to cereals, yogurt, or eaten as a standalone snack.
